concept.title: MME support for TLS for lawful interception (Feature f10324-02)
concept.shortdesc: This feature adds transport layer security (TLS) functionality to the MME LI links on X1_1 and X2 interfaces.

conbody.p: TLS v1.2 and v1.3 are supported. The root certificate authority (CA), intermediate CA certificates, and the certificates and the private keys can be configured and selected to be applied to the links via the associated to the link TLS profile.

The MME TLS feature is intended for use on MME-only or QA MME-AMF configurations. IPsec cannot be used on the SGSN and the TLS on the MME on QA/TA configurations at the same time, and the liconf command blocks such configuration on X1_1 and X2 interfaces.
For detailed configuring instructions, see Configuring TLS for the MME.
